params.title: The Weeknd
params.quote: And if i finally die in peace, just wrap my body in sheets and pour out the gasoline, it wont mean much to me
params.about_text: Abel Makkonen Tesfaye (born February 16, 1990), known professionally as the Weeknd, is a Canadian singer-songwriter and record producer. Known for his sonic versatility and dark lyricism, his music explores escapism, romance, and melancholia, and is often inspired by personal experiences.
